roleset.name: spark interest

example.name: active
example.text: Mary piqued John's interest with a new piece of information.
example.arg: with a new piece of information

example.name: active
example.text: The show Iron Chef piqued John's interest in cooking.

example.name: passive
example.text: [Teng Hsiang-Yang's interest]-1 was piqued *-1 when his father gave him two documents related * to the incident *T*.
example.arg: when his father gave him two documents related * to the incident *T*.
